tips.title: Today's Weather Tips!
tips.sunny: On hot days, adequate hydration is important. We recommend light meals with cool drinks!
tips.rainy: On rainy days, warm soups are the best! Relax at home and enjoy delivered food.
tips.cloudy: On cloudy days, how about some sweet desserts or warm tea to brighten your mood?
tips.hot: Scorching weather! Ice cream or shaved ice will help you cool down perfectly.
tips.humid: In humid weather, spicy food can help expel moisture from your body!
